title: Blood Moon Twisted Fate Looks Familiar...

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/ueMid9ps-so-is-this-twisted-fate-skin-going-to-get-any-new-edgy-vo

Well son of a fucking bitch.
We basically made the same post, 2 minutes away from each other.
Lol except the NA version got more up votes cause NA>EU
No worries I upvoted both of you guys then you can be together forever.

Even in your names there is colleration.
I sense conspiracy.

"Whenever TF's jungler feeds mid"

recall

>recall

That one actually took me a moment. Before I realized you maybe meant that was the actual _name_ of the video. ^^

And you were right! It was indeed "press B"!

happy to help,

But exclusively in a hard to understand convoluted way.
